web_snippets: Wehner is a contributing opinion writer for The New York Times, a contributing editor at The Atlantic, and the author of The Death of Politics. Peter Wehner.
Peter Wehner is a former speechwriter for the administrations of three former US presidents. He served as deputy director of speechwriting.
